alert.note: Alert for Mercer (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 3:37PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for Spring Creek at Zap affecting Mercer County in North Dakota... ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring Creek at Zap. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Right bank overflows-west end of Zap begins to flood. Crop land and county roads flood along creek as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 14.5 feet tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.9 feet on 09/10/2010. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
